replies.body:
1) Are you a sheep?
2) Do like bacon?
3) Pigs or Kiwis?
replies.body_tagged:
1) Are you a sheep?
2) Do like bacon?
3) Pigs or Kiwis?

replies.body:
@Midnight Me too :cc. Well, my friend had an account called mlg_hammy, and he gave it to me when I first started playing Minecraft. I started to make some YouTube videos with that account, but I wanted to get a new one since I was already sharing mlg_hammy with another 2 people. Then, I gave mlg_hammy to my friend because my dad allowed me to get a new account. Since I didn't want to really change my name a lot (because I already started making videos with an account that starts with "mlg"), I chose MLGPorky, since "porky" and "hammy" seemed close enough. :P

@Tar
1 - Yes!11!1!!
2 - I have bacon every week :P :P :P
3 - Kiwis.. duh.. I mean.. uh.. mind = blown
replies.body_tagged:

Since I didn't want to really change my name a lot (because I already started making videos with an account that starts with "mlg"), I chose MLGPorky, since "porky" and "hammy" seemed close enough. :P
